desc: Golf training aid to help eliminate slices, you can practice with every club in your bag, also reinforces what teaching professionals teach.

layout.text:
Practice with a purpose with Inside Striker.
A portable golf training aid designed to reinforce proper swing plane, eliminate your slice and provide instant feedback as you practice.
Practice with every club in your golf bag.
20% Discount with discount code IS2020, Free shipping!!
Please review product videos below.
